verses.roman:
ihā yei śune sei śrī-caitanya pāya
sudṛḍha viśvāsa-saha prema-bhakti haya

synonyms: ihā—this; yei—anyone who; śune—hears; sei—that person; śrī-caitanya pāya—will achieve Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; su-dṛḍha—firm; viśvāsa—conviction; saha—with; prema-bhakti—devotional service in great love; haya—there is.
translation: Anyone who hears this description of the car festival will attain Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu. He will also attain the elevated state by which he will have firm conviction in devotional service and love of Godhead.
